page.title: 15 MR. BRENDON ROSE
page.content: Account by MATTHEW ROSE age 10 My father's name is Brendon Rose. He does not work in the village so he has to drive to Andover. The firm he works for is Martin Thomas. It sells aluminium scaffolding. He has to go to sort out problems for other depots in Bristol and Sheffield.. He sometimes has to show people around and he also has to go to exhibitions. He writes leaflets about the scaffolding that he sells. For his leisure he goes sailing. We go to Southampton because we keep our boat there.We have got an outboard motor for our dinghy. We usually go to the Isle of Wight for a weekend.
